Summary Note:
Sánchez Muñoz González and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Madrid. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Sánchez Muñoz González is a 32 year old and comes from Spain.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Sánchez Muñoz González is currently divorced. He has 1 kid called Blanca.
Education Background:
Sánchez completed his secondary education at IES Andrés Laguna Segovia in 2001.
After that, he went on to study at Complutense University of Madrid until 2017.
Occupation History:
Sánchez Muñoz González is a 32 year old and comes from Spain.
In 2016, Sánchez Muñoz González started working as a Property Manager at Realia Business S.A., marking the beginning of his successful career.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 30000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns condo in Barcelona, where he resides. It is worth 1080000 EUR.

In 2018, he received an inheritance of 960000 EUR from his late grandmother, who was a prominent Investment Banker, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Sánchez as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
